channel.title: Nobody can attack anyone in my Server =(
channel.description: People cant attack each other in my server. My source in Fr33sc4p3 Pkz. I have no error s and PVP is on. People can attack monster though . The only way they can attack eachother is if they use anceints.

item.title: Nobody can attack anyone in my Server =(
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

[quote=“Haxor X, post:8, topic:110391”]most likeley its because you didn’t add the code for the weapon to be able to atk players…
i don’t know how to add but yea thats wat happened…[/quote]

Wtforz???

do my advice, or just get a new source.

Read full topic

item.title: Nobody can attack anyone in my Server =(
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3209 && absX <= 3286 && absY >= 3380 && absY <=3511 ) || (absX >= 2379 && absX <= 2411 && absY >= 3478 && absY <=3498 ) || (absX >= 2882 && absX <= 2916 && absY >= 3526 && absY <=3544 ) || (absX >= 2674 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3423 && absY <=3427 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

This Makes it wildy outside of varrock, n some safezones around the server, its my own nonwild, but w.e.

Read full topic
